::Zardus::

Feeling Squizzy watching him, Zardus turns his head from Najah, 
looking at Squizzy, remembering about LadyHawk's experiments.

"What do you think about Lady Hawk's experiments?" he asks her.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> 
> After she put her notes and the paper work away, she looked at 
> Zardus. She wondered if he might be interestd in what LadyHawk was 
> doing as well.
